sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.FSMSchedulingFilters</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>FSMSchedulingFilters</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var FSMSchedulingFilters = Class.create();
FSMSchedulingFilters.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    type: 'FSMSchedulingFilters',

    getTasksToReview: function() {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('wm_task_for_review');
        var res = [];
        if (gr.canRead()) {
            gr.query();
            while (gr.next()) {
                res.push(gr.work_order_task.sys_id.toString());
            }
        }
        return res;
    },

    getTasksAssignedToUndersizedCrew: function() {		
		var crewUtil = new global.CrewTasksScheduleUtil();
		return crewUtil.getTasksAssignedToUndersizedCrew();
    }
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-10-06 19:14:14</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8bd9842d53433010b69addeeff7b12a6</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>FSMSchedulingFilters</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Field Service Management" source="com.snc.work_management">b66bd6bb4722c210cd4e1ce4316d4387</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8bd9842d53433010b69addeeff7b12a6</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-04-18 09:52:37</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
